name: chseli
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cph, c2)), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1))))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cph, c2)), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1))))))
-| wcel(c1, csh)
-| wcel(c2, csh)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)
-| diffsc(s1, c2)

|- wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cph, c2)), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1))))))
-| wcel(c1, csh)
-| wcel(c2, csh)

-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

-| diffsc(s1, c2)

|- wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cph, c2)), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1))))))
-| wcel(c2, csh)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

-| diffsc(s0, c2)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)
-| diffsc(s1, c2)
-| wcel(c1, cch)

|- wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cph, c2)), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1))))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

-| diffsc(s0, c2)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

comment: Membership in subspace sum. (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
